pageProduct.name: Voost Magnesium Effervescent 60 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

VÖOST Magnesium Helps Support Nervous System Health

VÖOST the great tasting vitamin BOOST

We're passionate about all things effervescent and we're on a mission to make vitamin supplements a bit more appealing! We're armed with the world's largest range of effervescent vitamins and minerals to help you find just the right one to suit your needs.

Simple to use. Premium formulation. Great tasting.

Effervescent Vitamins and Minerals

Suitable For: Vegan Friendly

Size: 60 Tablets

Serving Size: 1 Tablet

Servings Per Pack: 60

KEY FEATURES

• VÖOST Magnesium Helps Support Muscle Health
• VÖOST Magnesium Helps Support Muscle Health
• VÖOST Magnesium Helps Support Muscle Health
• VÖOST Magnesium Helps Support Muscle Health
• VÖOST Magnesium Helps Support General Health and Wellbeing

Warnings

ALWAYS READ THE LABEL. FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS FOR USE.
Mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Adults only. Keep out of reach of children. Store tube tightly closed in a cool, dry place. Store below 25°C. Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing. Contains Saccharin Sodium.

Ingredients

Magnesium Carbonate Hydrate 823 mg (Equivalent to Magnesium 200 mg)
Each tablet contains 222 mg of sodium

Contains: Each tablet contains 222 mg of sodium

Directions

Adults: Take 1 tablet daily, dissolved in 200 ml of water, or as directed by your health professional.

USAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Start with 200mL of fresh water.
Add one Voost tablet & watch it fizz.
Once dissolved, it's ready to drink!
Experience the fizz!

Adults: Take 1 tablet daily, dissolved in 200mL of water, or as directed by your healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store tube tightly closed in a cool, dry place. Store below 25°C. Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Please recycle this box.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
